name: circuits
description: Zero-Knowledge Proof circuits for Decentralized Trust Platform

scripts.setup: snarkjs powersoftau new bn128 12 pot12_0000.ptau && snarkjs powersoftau contribute pot12_0000.ptau pot12_0001.ptau --name="First contribution" -v && snarkjs powersoftau prepare phase2 pot12_0001.ptau pot12_final.ptau -v
scripts.ceremony: snarkjs groth16 setup build/nftOwnership.r1cs pot12_final.ptau nftOwnership_0000.zkey && snarkjs zkey contribute nftOwnership_0000.zkey nftOwnership_0001.zkey --name="First contribution" -v && snarkjs zkey export verificationkey nftOwnership_0001.zkey verification_key.json
scripts.generate-verifier: snarkjs zkey export solidityverifier nftOwnership_0001.zkey verifier.sol

author: Decentralized Trust Platform Team
